com.oanda.fxtrade.api

Class API

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oanda.fxtrade.api.API

  • public class API
extends java.lang.Object
    API is a factory class with static methods for creation of different class instances used to utilise OANDA fxTrade API.
    Author:
    www.oanda.com
